name: Warframe Wukong Prime Access: Accessories Pack
detailed_description:
Get Wukong Prime Access now and instantly add the latest Prime Customizations to your Inventory!

For more Prime Access Bundle options, click here.

PRIME ACCESSORIES PACK
Jindou Prime Syandana
Corposant Prime Ephemera
Sanzang Prime Kubrow Armor
Tang Prime Kubrow Skin
Kubrow Starter Kit
90-day Affinity Booster
90-day Credit Booster

short_description: Make the latest Prime Customizations yours instantly. Wukong Prime Accessories includes Jindou Prime Syandana, Corposant Prime Ephemera, Sanzang Prime Kubrow Armor, Tang Prime Kubrow Skin, Kubrow Starter Kit, 90-day Affinity Booster and 90-day Credit Booster.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Video:DirectX 10+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:35 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.

legal_notice: Warframe and the Warframe logo are registered trademarks of Digital Extremes Ltd.
